name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:**  Connective tissues large enough to be given a specific name are considered adjacent structures.  For example, prevertebral fascia and jugular vein have names.
rows:
Localized only

    Invasive tumor confined to site of origin

    Localized, NOS

Tumor confined to mucosa of site of origin

Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature 

Stated as T3, T4a, or T4 [NOS ]

Regional by direct extension only

    Extension to adjacent structures
    More than one region of pharynx involved (oropharynx, nasopharynx, hypopharynx)
    Pharynx and oral cavity involved

    Any of the above WITH fixation

Mucosa only of pharynx and oral cavity involved
Mucosa only of more than one region of pharynx involved:
    Oropharynx
    Nasopharynx
    Hypopharynx

Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature of any structure listed

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
